file_content.text: Yes, that's what I'm saying--House Thul troops are running rampant down here, and they're all coming from the coast!
If you don't send me more men, we'll never get sensors down there--the Thuls will just keep coming until it's too late.
Two weeks! In two weeks we'll be dead or singing the Imperial anthem! Blast it....
Heard that, did you? Yeah, I could really use a hand here.
Yeah, you can say that again. If you think you could lend me a hand, I'd definitely appreciate it.
We need to get our sensors working along the coastline--simple repairs, but it's the only way we'll see these Thul invaders coming.
Once the sensors are active again, fire this flare from the bridge to alert our forces. And be on your guard... Thul commandos are everywhere.
There's got to be some way to get this done....
Nice work on those sensors. House Thul won't surprise us again.
Duke Brant's men are on the move. He wants to speak with you.
Duke Brant's men are waiting for your signal. Fire that flare!
Get those sensors back online before House Thul wipes us all out.
Say again, Duke Brant-- the sensor repairs failed? This is our fourth attempt. You say it was House Thul forces again?
I'm doing my best, but the Republic's stretched thin. Command tells me two weeks--
Here, you'll need the coordinates of the sensors. Be careful down there-- Thul's taking no prisoners.
Duke Brant Organa? Come in, Duke Brant? Blast this comm signal!
